entity.name: phenotype_parameter
entity.query: select id, stable_id, name, stable_key from phenotype_parameter

entity.name: phenotype_procedure_parameter
entity.query: select procedure_id, parameter_id from phenotype_procedure_parameter where parameter_id=${phenotype_parameter.id}

entity.name: phenotype_procedure
entity.query: select id, stable_id, name, stable_key from phenotype_procedure where id=${phenotype_procedure_parameter.procedure_id}

entity.name: phenotype_parameter2
entity.query: select concat('${phenotype_procedure.name}', '___', name) as proc_param_name, concat('${phenotype_procedure.stable_id}', '___', stable_id) as proc_param_stable_id, stable_id, name, stable_key from phenotype_parameter where id=${phenotype_procedure_parameter.parameter_id}

entity.name: phenotype_pipeline_procedure
entity.query: select pipeline_id from phenotype_pipeline_procedure where procedure_id=${phenotype_procedure.id}

entity.name: phenotype_pipeline
entity.query: select stable_id, name, stable_key, concat(name, '___', '${phenotype_procedure.name}') as pipeline_proc_name from phenotype_pipeline where id=${phenotype_pipeline_procedure.pipeline_id}
